subject: THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNO
body:
THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR
FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA.
 DR OLAYEMI CARDOSO.
I therefore counsel you this message to let you know  that  i  am (Dr Olayemi Michael Cardoso) I assumed office last  two weeks as the new CENTRAL BANK  GOVERNOR,as  i was directed by our new President (Bola Ahmad Tinubu) on a mission to clear all outstanding debts owed to beneficiaries by past CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR Godwin Emefiele who in his capacity delay so many international fund transfer under his custody after Beneficiaries has spent a lot of money to get their fund release to no avail ,During the process of my verification , i discovered that Mr Godwin Emefiele connived with some director of CBN to divart beneficiaries fund oversea  for their  own personal  use,By deleting  some vital information attach to beneficiaries fund transfer
I am asking you to resend your details for Validation of your fund payment file.
PLEASE  SEND YOUR REPLY TO -  
bankgovernornewcentral@gmail.com
Yours Sincerely
Dr  Olayemi Cardoso
For Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN)

subject: Re:   THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNO
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out and congratulations on your new position as the Central Bank Governor of the Federal Republic of Nigeria. It's quite an impressive role!

I'm intrigued by the situation you've described, it sounds like a significant task to clear all those debts. I'm curious, how did President Bola Ahmad Tinubu come to choose you for this mission? 

Also, could you please elaborate more on the process of validation for the fund payment file? I'd love to understand more about it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Evangeline

subject: THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA. READ AND COMPLY NOW FOR THE FAST PAYMENT OF YOUR FUND IN MY DISPENSATION
body:
THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR
FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA.
 DR OLAYEMI CARDOSO.
[image: image.png]

ATTN- Evangeline.

I want to thank you for your mail to me, I  want to let you know  that you
must surely get your fund payment in my dispensation, the former central
bank governor mess up with international  fund payment and he is now facing
the law,  The former central bank governor has been jailed,  I  want you to
know that this is a new down in  NIGERIA,  you are advised to stop any
dealing with any body except this great office,

About  20 foreigners who has responded positively to my mail and directives
has all receive their fund payment in good faith, i want you to know that
your file for your fast fund payment has been pass to my desk for immediate
fund payment to you as soon as you respond positively to my directive, you
will be smiling out from your bank with your fund payment this time around.

You are hereby advised to send down  the following for your fund payment
file  updation and  your fund validation process . Your full name, your
sex, your home address, your direct telephone number, your age and
occupation.

Your  account details  are also needed where you want your long awaited
10.5 million us dollars  life changing fund payment to you for us to update
your fund payment file for  the legal process for you to get your fund
payment in my dispensation.

CONGRATULATION IN ADVANCE

Yours Sincerely
Dr  Olayemi Cardoso
For Central Bank of Nigeria

subject: Re: THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA. READ AND COMPLY NOW FOR THE FAST PAYMENT OF YOUR FUND IN MY DISPENSATION
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about the changes happening in Nigeria, especially with the central bank. I'm glad to know that justice is being served.

I'm curious though, how did you come across my contact? And could you please provide more details about this fund payment? How exactly does it work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Evangeline

subject: Re: THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA. READ AND COMPLY NOW FOR THE FAST PAYMENT OF YOUR FUND IN MY DISPENSATION
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's interesting to hear about the changes happening in Nigeria, especially with the central bank. I'm glad to know that justice is being served.

I'm curious about this fund payment you mentioned. Could you please provide more details? How did my name come up for this? And what exactly does the fund payment entail?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Evangeline

subject: THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA. I ATTACHED MY IDENTITY CARD. READ AND COMPLY NOW
body:
THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR
FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA.
 DR OLAYEMI CARDOSO.
[image: image.png]

ATTN- Evangeline.

I want to thank you for your mail to me, I  want to let you know  that  as
I took the mantle of leadership as new central bank Governor, your fund
payment file was passed to my desk for the payment of  your long overdue
United Nations organization compensation fund payment to you.

You are hereby advised to send down  the following for your fund payment
file  updation and  your fund validation process . Your full name, your
sex, your home address, your direct telephone number, your age and
occupation. for us to commence the legal process for you to get your fund
payment without any delay.







CONGRATULATION IN ADVANCE

Yours Sincerely
Dr  Olayemi Cardoso
For Central Bank of Nigeria

subject: Re: THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA. I ATTACHED MY IDENTITY CARD. READ AND COMPLY NOW
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me and congratulations on your new position as the Central Bank Governor. It's quite an honor to be in contact with someone of such high stature.

I'm intrigued by this United Nations fund payment you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? How did I become eligible for this fund? And what is the purpose of this fund?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Evangeline

subject: THE NEW CENTRAL BANK GOVERNOR FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA. PLEASE SEND YOUR DETAILS FOR WE TO COMMENCE OF YOUR FUND PAYMENT PROCESS

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund that is aimed at helping humanity and promoting good business. Could you please provide more details about it? How does it work and what kind of businesses are considered "VERY GOOD BUSINESS"? I'm really curious to know more.

body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's always exciting to hear about new opportunities and potential investments. I'm curious, could you tell me more about this life-changing fund payment? What kind of investment are we talking about here? 

As for my current status, I am happily employed and living comfortably in my country. However, I prefer not to share specific personal details online for security reasons. I hope you understand.

Looking forward to hearing more from you!

Best wishes,
Evangeline
